thread.section_title: PRTG Network Monitor Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von PRTG Network Monitor | paessler.com
thread.title: Hendra Septa
thread.title_full: PRTG Network Monitor bewertet von Hendra Septa

author: Hendra Septa
title: Hendra Septa
text:
Canggih (Indonesia) means Sophisticated in English I used PRTG since 2012 to monitor the internet traffic in my office. I found it very similar to MRTG tools but more good looking and more sophisticated. It also has an "alarm" of internet connection, so when the internet connection drop it will send me e-mail to notify. It very helpful, because I also get a report about Downtime average in a month.
The "sever client" system really help me so I can keep on track my internet connection anywhere I go.
